prerequisite: Dragonborn, any primal class, dragon breath power that deals lightning damage
name: Storm Dragon
text: Some dragons are like forces of nature, the elemental power coursing through their bodies akin to the mightiest forces of storm, earth, or sea. The catastrophic dragons embody the destructive forces of nature, but even the blue dragon is a living incarnation of the storm. Your mastery of primal magic has led you to this path: Like these dragons, the power of the storm flows in your blood and erupts in your breath.

features.stormSpirit(11thLevel): You gain resist 10 lightning and resist 10 thunder
features.thunderingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make an attack, you can push each target you hit with that attack a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier and knock each target prone
features.soulOfTheStormDragon(16thLevel): Your primal powers ignore the targetâ€™s resistance to lightning or thunder
features.stormDragonWings(16thLevel): You gain overland flight with a speed of 8

flavorText: Dragons wheel in the winds of the cyclone and dive to earth with each flash of lightning.
